title: I keep disconnecting in client
body:
I keep disconnecting in client.  Sometimes it takes for 10-15 minutes to find a game., because it keeps disconnecting me while Im in queue. It is only for League of Legends.  When im in game , everything is normal. After game ends, sometimes I cant see game stats and it says that im disconnected, I don't know if it is because of my internet or what ?
Does anyone knows something about it ? Have someone experienced this ?

replies.body: I have been having this problem for a long while now and no fix has ever popped up. The connecting issues thread for me didnt help, i keep constantly getting dc'd and always miss game q's because of it.

The funny thing is when i keep clicking on client menu items that require connection to server(like store) im not gona get disconnect, but doesnt look like a solution for me. At some point of time u getting dc but probably in queue you are still looking for it no 'Accept' pop up show up when game is ready. Happens only in league tho, steam and origin works like charm (dota 2, battlefield 1).

Bump

I had that problem for more then a year and it looks like i finally solved it.
I have set up a QOS and port forwarding on the tcp/ip ports:
2099 TCP - PVP.Net
5223 TCP - PVP.Net
5222 TCP - PVP.Net
In addition to that I opened up an exception for league on windows firewall.

hope this helps.

did you find the fix? i experience this for 2 years now and the preseason 8 made it so when i get trying to reconnect while in a queue with a friend and it stops the queue also stops even if there was no accept popup for the friend(that doesnt have the problem)

When you're in queue and accept, your connection needs to transfer you over to the same group as everyone else.  It sounds like your network is having problems transitioning between our game and pvp.net servers, so you're getting left behind.  You should go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and tune up your network.  That should get you in-game without issues.
